content:
@Alya Abbott I have some queries regarding #22865, that I would like to clear.

We are looking to handle only the labels of the user profile as pointed out in the screenshot below?

image.png
I don't quite understand the question -- what alternative interpretations are on your mind?

Initially I thought the issue was about the text in the tab switcher as it takes two lines to fit the text in case of some non-English languages. I had this doubt because I didn't notice any problems related to the labels myself.

Having read the issue again though, it's quite clear that it is about the user field labels, so I'll proceed with that until then.
